description: Delight in the balance of earthy, smoked and citrus flavours in this barley, quinoa and smoked salmon salad. Lunch is served.
keywords: Grain salad,Pescatarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Budget,Summer,Halal,Christmas,Wheat free,Salmon
name: Barley & Quinoa Salad With Smoked Salmon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse barley in a strainer and place in a saucepan with 3 cups water. Cover and bring to a gentle boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes or until still firm but soft to the bite.

Place quinoa in a second saucepan with 1 cup water. Cover and bring to a gentle boil reduce heat and cook for about 10 minutes. Remove and place in a bowl to cool. When barley is cooked strain and add to quinoa. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, for the dressing, whisk oil, lemon rind, juice and horseradish together. Season to taste.
Combine grains, beetroot and coriander. Drizzle over half the dressing and gently stir to combine.
Transfer grains to a serving platter. Top with avocado, smoked salmon and reserved coriander. Drizzle with remaining dressing and season with cracked black pepper, to serve.
